content: My pset buddy told me she dropped the class last week, but she's my pset buddy again this week. I can finish this pset by myself this time, but next week, can I get a new pset buddy?
subject: pset buddy dropped class

content: You can do it by yourself and we will try to assign someone new next time. I can actually assign a new buddy for you for this pset -- do you still want one?
actually that would be great if you could set me up with one for this week!
